page.title: 08VILLAGE HALL.
page.content: BISHAMPTON ABBERTON AND THROCKMORTON VILLAGES' HALL, is situated in Broad Lane and serves the communities of the three villages. It was built in 1971, extended and refurbished in 1981. The building consists of the main hall with stage, committee room, full kitchen, bar and toilet facilities, together with storage areas. It is surrounded by a car park, grass play area and in 1985 a wooden adventure playground was added. The hall is administered by a committee consisting of six elected members together with representatives from each of the village groups which use the facilities. These include playgroup, youth club, drama group, parish council, senior citizens club, and political organisations. Various fund raising activities are organised to supplement the income from bookings
